topic: Choosing instance types for Amazon Neptune

  entities:
  
    Amazon Neptune|Service
    Neptune pricing page|Creative Work
  
  proposition: Amazon Neptune is a service that offers a number of different instance sizes and families.
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    
    entity-attributes:
    Amazon Neptune|IS|service
      
  proposition: Amazon Neptune instance sizes and families offer different capabilities suited to different graph workloads.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
  
    entity-attributes:
    Amazon Neptune|HAS|instance sizes and families
    
  proposition: The section about choosing instance types for Amazon Neptune is meant to help users choose the best instance type for their needs.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
  
    entity-attributes:
    
  proposition: Each instance-type in Amazon Neptune families has pricing information.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
  
    entity-attributes:
    Amazon Neptune|HAS|pricing information
    
  proposition: The pricing information for Amazon Neptune instance-types is available on the Neptune pricing page.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
    Amazon Neptune|AVAILABLE_ON|Neptune pricing page
  
    entity-attributes:
    
  proposition: The Neptune pricing page is located at https://aws.amazon.com/neptune/pricing/.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
  
    entity-attributes:
    Neptune pricing page|LOCATED_AT|https://aws.amazon.com/neptune/pricing/
